class.name: WhisperModel
class.brief_description: A resource containing the file path to a Whisper AI model binary.
class.description: This resource represents a loaded Whisper model binary (usually with a [code].bin[/code] extension). It stores the path to the model file so that [WhisperFull] can initialize the whisper.cpp context when the model is assigned.

members.member: The absolute or resource path to the whisper model binary file.
